title: 1999/393/EC: Council decision of 22 July 1997 concerning the conclusion of an Agreement between the European Community and the United Arab Emirates on trade in textile products
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 22 July 1997
concerning the conclusion of an Agreement between the European Community and the United Arab Emirates on trade in textile products
(1999/393/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The Agreement between the European Community and the United Arab Emirates on trade in textile products is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorised to designate the person empowered to sign the Agreement in order to bind the Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 July 1997.
For the Council
The President
J. POOS
(1) OJ L 169, 8.7.1996, p. 39.
